transcript: Dean graciosi who's Tony Robbins right-hand man I asked him is Fame worth it I was very big on the like just be rich and Anonymous like I liked just being rich and Anonymous he said you know Alex I get people who send me weird messages and threats and threatened my family he said but if that's the price I have to pay to make the impact I want to have I'd pay it every day of the week and we said that it really hit me because I was like man I guess I'm trying to stay in this hole and not be known I was kind of shunning all that and he's like but if you want to make the impact you want to help the people that you say you want to help like you have to become known and so that was probably the last push that got me into like all right I'll start making content
